name: AI Upscaler Plugin 1.4
description: AI upscaling plugin with automated hardware benchmarking, intelligent fallback system, pre-processing cache, and advanced low-end hardware support. Features comprehensive performance testing, comparison view, TV remote optimization, and sidebar integration.
overview:
AI-Powered Video Upscaling Plugin v1.4.0

Hardware Benchmarking Features:
• Automated Hardware Testing: System detection and optimization
• Intelligent Fallback: Auto-switch to lighter models on weak hardware
• Pre-Processing Cache: Background upscaling for instant playback
• Comparison View: Before/after quality preview
• TV Remote Support: Optimized for Smart TV navigation
• Sidebar Integration: Native Jellyfin settings panel
• Low-End Hardware: Intel N-series, ARM, NAS optimization
• Performance Testing: Real-time FPS, CPU/GPU monitoring

versions.changelog: v1.4.0 STABLE UPDATE: NEW - Automated hardware benchmarking system, intelligent fallback for low-end hardware (iGPUs, ARM, NAS), pre-processing cache for better performance, comparison view for quality testing, TV remote optimization (WebOS/Tizen), sidebar settings panel integration, comprehensive benchmark console with real-time testing, automatic model optimization based on hardware capabilities
